Lady Bird Strickland (nke a na-akpọkwa Lady Bird Cleveland ma ọ bụ Ladybird Cleveland) (July 24, 1926 na June 2, 2015) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe osise nke ihe nketa Africa, Cherokee na Irish, onye ọrụ ya na-egosi ahụmịhe ndị Africa na America, na-elekwasị anya n'akụkụ ndụ site na ịgba ohu na mmegharị ikike ọbọdọ na ntụrụndụ na ọdịbendị nke President Barack Obama. Ọ bụ nne nke ónyé na-ese ejiji Pat Cleveland.

A mụrụ Strickland na ịda ogbenye na Cornelia, Georgia, nne ojii na nna Irish-Scottish na ónyé ojii. Nné ya na-elekọta ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ site n'ụlọ ha a na-akpọ Sally's Tea Room, nke ghọrọ ebe a ma ama n'ógbè ahụ. Otú ọ dị, ezinụlọ ya ka dara ogbenye
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ isii. Ọ malitere ise ihe mgbè ọ dị obérè, na-eji akwụkwọ nwéré eriri site na mbadamba n'ihi na o nweghị akwụkwọ nka
Dị ka nwa agbọghọ Africa America nọ n'akụkụ Georgia nke kewara ekewa nke ukwuu, a naghị agba ya ume ikwupụta onwe ya
Ndị nkụzi ya baara ya mba mgbe e jidere ya ka ọ na-ese ihe n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, na-eji osisi hickory na-eti ya ihe.

Mgbè ọ nọ na Harlem, Strickland sooro onye na-egwu saxophon Johnny Johnston nwee mmekọahụ, nke mere ka a mụọ nwá ya nwanyị Pat Cleveland na 1950. Ọ zụlitere nwa ya nwanyị dị ka nne naanị ya na Harlem.
N'ime afọ 1960, Strickland tinyere aka na ọrụ nwa ya nwanyị, ọrụ ime ihe ngosi
Strickland rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-eyi uwe nwa ya nwanyị, n'ihi na n'oge ahụ Cleveland erubeghị afọ
Ha abụọ ga-eme njem n'etiti ọrụ ihe ngosi Cleveland na bọs Greyhound ruo ọtụtụ ọnwa n'otu oge.
